title: Balance History
description: Record daily snapshots of balance and cashflow and visualize trends over time.

settings.enabledHint: When disabled, no snapshots are recorded and scheduled capture is turned off.
settings.endOfDayCaptureHint: Best-effort daily capture near {{time}} (requires Alarms API).
settings.alarmUnsupported: Alarms API is not available in this browser; end-of-day capture cannot be enabled.

cashflowDisabled.title: Income/outcome history will be empty
cashflowDisabled.description: Today cashflow fetching is disabled and end-of-day capture is disabled. Enable either "Show today cashflow" or "End-of-day capture" to record income/outcome values.

filters.accountsHint: Select accounts to include in charts.

emptyRange.title: No snapshots in this range
emptyRange.description: Snapshots exist, but none fall within the selected date range. Try widening the range or refreshing an account.

disabled.title: Balance History is disabled
disabled.description: Enable Balance History in settings to start recording snapshots.

incompleteSelection.title: Total may be incomplete
incompleteSelection.description: Totals are computed on a best-effort basis by summing accounts that have data on each day. When coverage is incomplete ({{minCovered}}–{{maxCovered}}/{{totalAccounts}} accounts), totals may be underestimated.

empty.title: No snapshots yet
empty.description: Enable Balance History and refresh an account to record the first snapshot.

breakdown.title: Account breakdown
breakdown.empty: No data to display for this breakdown.

hints.pieDisabledForNegative: Pie charts are unavailable for negative values.

trend.title: Trend
trend.subtitle: Per-account series with gaps for missing days.
trend.subtitleTotal: Total (sum) across selected accounts; values may be underestimated on days with incomplete coverage.
